"The site has been breached for discharges from storm tanks during non-storm conditions."

In English. Berkhamsted STW is operating illegally by dumping sewage into the River Bulbourne, a chalk stream, 1 of only 225 in the entire world.

And the @EnvAgency does what exactly? https://t.co/SCyPhZUuaR

This is 1 of only 225 #Chalkstreams in the üåé & this is today‚Äôsüí©show on the Gaywood River @CharlieJGardner @GlavenEel @Feargal_Sharkey @jamesowild @EnvAgencyAnglia @The_WMA @N_Rivers_Trust @AnglianWater @WestNorfolkBC  How much longer must this river suffer ? https://t.co/pVGLeaiZWh

We have been focussing on the #IsleofWight over the last few days both on shore & at sea. tweets.text: @DefraGovUK @EnvAgencyAnglia People are now using bags for life as throw away items

England is at risk of facing #WaterShortages by 2050 due to #ClimateChange and population growth.

We're working with water companies to tackle this challenge and protect our water supplies.

Find out how: https://t.co/3OsurzkVGO https://t.co/Lu2mHFgV6F

@SaveLeaMarshes @mayorofhackney @HackneyLabour @EnvAgency A good start would be to depave along the @LeeValleyPark #TottenhamMarshes Watermead Way A1055 to @MeridianWater & install filter drains* This is not a poster park wetlands project but could be done in sections re funding 1/2  * slides by @stormwater_jo https://t.co/4YALyq2pfQ https://t.co/hOtSfO51O6
This am @RSPBAireValley #Fairburnbirds 7 Spoonbill, fem c.scoter (Village bay) , Bittern (heard) and Little gull (2cy) the best. @RareBirdAlertUK @nybirdnews

annotations.normalized_text: South West Property Flood Resilience Pathfinder

tweets.text:
Thrilled to welcome @SouthWestWater as a new partner on the South West Property Flood Resilience Pathfinder project, and we're looking forward to working together in future. Learn more about the Pathfinder project here: https://t.co/loogChwTPf
@DevComsTogether @EnvAgencySW https://t.co/ixasNeGwHK

@EnvAgency @JamesBevanEA @ClareDinnisEA Pls can you talk about this is your next statement. If they‚Äôre opening the gas wells every Friday we need to know because we will go& sleep elsewhere even if it‚Äôs  in a tent @Cap_it_off #stopthestink @DefraGovUK @MPGeorgeEustice @matth https://t.co/pFg7Lewc7D

Very sad to see sanitary products in the sea when going for a high tide swim at Walpole bay just now @SouthernWater @EnvAgencySE @bbcsoutheast @IsleThanetNews @ThanetCouncil What is going on? No alert on @sascampaigns so no alert been given. Urgently need signs up now!

@Helen_Clinton @SianieRoo @nelliephant @RedIndustries2 @WalleysL @ClareDinnisEA @EnvAgencyMids I'm telling you, if you are all noticing a pattern on when the smell is strongest, they must be opening the gas extraction wells to release the built-up noxious gas. I suspect they have done the same here. Doesn't sound like compliance to me. @StinkStopthe @Mullaghglass123
